author: vorot93
content: What would Ethereum lose if we no longer included logsbloom, receiptsroot and gasused in block header?

author: sky.cactus
content:
Logs Bloom: In theory, increased network traffic for stateless clients as they can't make an educated guess whether or not a block contains a log of interest when they only have the header.
Receipts Root: Stateless: wouldn't be able to prove receipts, you would have to execute the block locally (with witnesses, this may be fine).
Gas Used: Stateless: Can't calculate the next base fee without executing the block.

author: _shemnon
content: witnesses are a better solution for the light client needs.
